No real leadership.   Asked for month to get training, never happened.  Finally took a different position.

review_title: A roller Coaster of dodging political influences...

cons: It's a man's world...there was not equal opportunity....upper management was not held to accountability.  Very poor money management...unable to keep good quality providers..did not keep up with the job market as far as wages were concerned.  Very top heavy..

review_title: Definitely not ideal place to be

cons: Poor staffing, poor quality of work, many errors, extremely long delays when caring for patients, many staff do not want to be there or have burned out over the years and are simply staying until retirement
